testcase.name: Verify user is able to hit the Opencart application
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the opencart application...........................passed Then User should see opencart logo present in the header....................passed And User should see My account text present in the page.....................passed

testcase.name: Verify user is able to login the application
testcase.system-out: When User enter the email address 'abcd@gmail.com' in the email field.......passed When User enter the password 'Testone1' in the password field...............passed When User click on the login button.........................................passed Then User should see My Account in the Page.................................passed

testcase.classname: Opencart login functionality module and Order placement Test automation scripts
testcase.name: User is able to place order in the application
testcase.system-out: When User clicks product they want and it should lead to the respective page.passed And User clicks on a particular model of the product........................passed And User clicks on add to cart..............................................passed And User clicks on checkout.................................................passed
